  • Method Details

    • highlightBlocks

      void highlightBlocks(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, Collection<org.bukkit.Location> locationSet, HighlightStyle highlightStyle)
      Highlight blocks in locationSet for player, using blocks of material type as highlight
      Parameters:
      player - the player for whom to display the highlighted blocks
      locationSet - a collection of Locations of blocks to highlight
      highlightStyle - HighlightStyle enum value to use for highlighting

    • unHighlightBlocks

      void unHighlightBlocks(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Remove highlighting from all blocks for player
      Parameters:
      player - the player for whom to remove all block highlighting

    • getUnhighlightTask

      Optional<org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask> getUnhighlightTask(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Get a task from the pending remove map
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose task will be retrieved from the map
      Returns:
      BukkitTask - the task retrieved

    • putUnhighlightTask

      void putUnhighlightTask(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask task)
      Insert a task into the pending remove task map
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose task will be inserted in the map
      task - the task to be inserted in the map

    • cancelUnhighlightTask

      void cancelUnhighlightTask(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Cancel task for player and remove from the unhighlight task map
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose task will be removed from the map
